metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7919 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Go before 1.12.16 and 1.13.x before 1.13.7 (and the crypto/cryptobytepackage before 0.0.0-20200124225646-8b5121be2f68 for Go) allows attacks onclients (resulting in a panic) via a malformed X.509 certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.7-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.7-1ubuntu1').
